body:
#### PR description:

Step toward transition to dd4hep for Phase2 scenarios

#### PR validation:

Tests were done on privately. Once #31832 is integrated the phase2 scenarios will be updated to make use of these files and run in dd4hep scenarios

title: Phase2-gex26 Step toward transition to dd4hep for Phase2 scenarios
